import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { StateService } from '../service/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vacations', templateUrl: './vacations.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vacations.component.css'], }) export class VacationsComponent implements OnInit { vacations: any; showRegisterModal: any | undefined; showLoginModal: any | undefined; nameOfUser: any | undefined; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private stateService: StateService) {} ngOnInit() { this.stateService.currentShowRegisterModal.subscribe(value => { this.showRegisterModal = value; }); this.stateService.currentShowLoginModal.subscribe(value => { this.showLoginModal = value; }); this.stateService.currentN.subscribe(value => { this.showLoginModal = value; }); this.http .get('https://react-node-mysql-jwt.herokuapp.com/vacations') .subscribe((data) => { this.vacations = data; }); } }
